question: Indian Air Force signed MoU with which of the following universities to establish a ‘Chair of Excellence’ which will be named as “Marshal of the Air Force Arjan Singh Chair of Excellence”?
explanation: Savitribai Phule Pune University signed MoU with Indian Air Force to establish "Marshal of the Air Force Arjan Singh Chair of Excellence". Arjan Singh was the only IAF officer to be promoted to the rank of the Marshal of the Indian Air Force which resembles the army rank of Field Marshal.
